This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing out side about 10:15 PM seen the first red and orange light in the sky then I ran into the house and got my cell phone to take pictures and video and had my wife come out and then we seen the next 9 fly by, No sound and they looked like they were all following the same flight path.
Summary: Seen 10 red-orange lights following the same flight path
